column5: The Lazy Breeze Retreat is a 640 square foot, newly renovated, condo on North Padre Island. King size bed with a pull out sofa, full kitchen and dining table. Full shower/tub combo. Secured entry. Walking distance to restaurants and the new Schlitterbahn! *please read 'other things to note' section. Thanks!
column8: *Newly renovated*Pool, Close to Beach, King bed
